thread.title: Marco's Pizza opens new Melbourne location
thread.title_full: Marco's Pizza opens new Melbourne location

title: Marco's Pizza opens new Melbourne location
text:
Marco's Pizza opens new Melbourne location Marco's Pizza, a Toledo, Ohio-based franchise, to open it's fifth location in Brevard Post to Facebook Marco's Pizza opens new Melbourne location Marco's Pizza, a Toledo, Ohio-based franchise, to open it's fifth location in Brevard Check out this story on floridatoday.com: http://on.flatoday.com/1FBnR1c Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation Suzy Fleming Leonard , FLORIDA TODAY 12:59 p.m. EDT October 5, 2015 
Marco's Pizza, a Toledo, Ohio-based franchise, will soon open it's fifth location in Brevard. 
A grand opening celebration will be from 1-4 p.m Oct. 18 at the restaurant at 4320 S. Babcock St. Suite 101, Melbourne, according to a press release from the company. The event will feature free pizza, face painting and a remote broadcast by 98.5 FM. Donations will be accepted for Habitat for Humanity. 
Hours at the new restaurant are 11 a.m.-10 p.m. Sunday-Thursday, 11 a.m.-midnight Friday and Saturday. Call 321-608-3100. The restaurant offers carryout and delivery, as well as dining room seating. 
Marco's Pizza has opened a fifth location in Brevard County on Babcock Street in Melbourne. (Photo: Submitted photo) 
Marco's Pizza has announced plans to open more than 300 restaurants in the coming years, with a goal of 35 new stores by the end of 2015. 
Marco's was founded in 1978 by Italian-born Pasquale Giammarco. There are now more than 600 Marco's Pizza restaurants in 35 states, the Bahamas and Puerto Rico, according to the release. 
Brevard locations are at: 3600 N. Wickham Road, Melbourne Eastern Florida State College Melbourne campus Eastern Florida State College Cocoa Campus 3650 Murrell Road, Rockledge 
More information about Marco's is available at www.marcos.com . Read or Share this story: http://on.flatoday.com/1FBnR1c Most Popular
